OM_Karlach_COM.synopsis: If Mattis makes it to HAV and speaks with Karlach, he will recognize her from the Blood Wars. Karlach then will give him a good advice. If companion Wyll is nearby he will join the conversation.
OM_Karlach_COM.how_to_trigger: 1. Load SCL and set up the tiefling path using the debug book.2. Recruit Karlach.3. In recon: goto -54; 27; 1404. Speak with Mattis.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM.synopsis: If Mattis makes it to HAV and speaks with Karlach, he will recognize her from the Blood Wars. Karlach then will give him a good advice. If companion Wyll is nearby he will join the conversation.
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM.how_to_trigger: 1. Load SCL and set up the tiefling path using the debug book.2. Recruit Karlach as an avatar.3. In recon: goto -54; 27; 1404. Speak with Mattis.OR1. Load SCL and set up the tiefling path using the debug book.2. Recruit Karlach3. In recon: goto -54; 27; 1404. Talk to Mattis as Karlach while she is far from the party.

OM_Karlach_COM_6.speaker: Mattis
OM_Karlach_COM_6.text: Heya - you're back! I was thinking... I didn't recognise you before, but you're... you're Karlach, aren't you?

OM_Karlach_COM_18.speaker: Mattis
OM_Karlach_COM_18.text: A lot of us were in Avernus. We saw you fighting. You were so good!

OM_Karlach_COM_17.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_COM_17.text: Well! I, uh - yeah. I guess I was. I mean, you should avoid fighting for devils if you can. But if you can't, it helps to have a good right hook.
OM_Karlach_COM_17.context: NodeContext: Karlach is feeling a little chuffed at the positive attention here. She's trying to be a good role model but is also delighted that her reputation precedes her

OM_Karlach_COM_7.speaker: Mattis
OM_Karlach_COM_7.text: I saw you lay out a maw demon in two hits! Bam, bam! We were all like 'whoa'.

OM_Karlach_COM_22.speaker: Wyll
OM_Karlach_COM_22.text: Ever heard of the Blade of Frontiers, kid? If you like monster-smashing, you might be a fan of his work.

OM_Karlach_COM_0.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_COM_0.text: A lovely chap. Didn't kick arse in the Blood War, but that's neither here nor there.
OM_Karlach_COM_0.context: NodeContext: She's winding Wyll up a little/ bringing the focus back onto herself. This is a friendly tug-of-war rather than a very serious one.

OM_Karlach_COM_8.speaker: Wyll
OM_Karlach_COM_8.text: That's true - but he never got kidnapped by a devil either.
OM_Karlach_COM_8.context: NodeContext: Still a friendly repartee but Wyll is tryign to get the uperhand and it might be getting a little arch.

OM_Karlach_COM_16.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_COM_16.text: No, he only sold his soul to one.
OM_Karlach_COM_16.context: NodeContext: Still a friendly repartee but it's getting pointed now.

OM_Karlach_COM_11.speaker: Mattis
OM_Karlach_COM_11.context: NodeContext: Mattis is listening to Wyll and Karlach argue and trying to get waht they're saying. This is the breaking point in the humorous tension up to this point.

OM_Karlach_COM_19.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_COM_19.text: Sorry, kid. Look, forget about us begrudgers and bruisers.

OM_Karlach_COM_13.speaker: Mattis
OM_Karlach_COM_13.text: How'd you learn to fight like that?

OM_Karlach_COM_29.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_COM_29.text: Had to. Life didn't pull any punches. It was up to me to learn to take a hit - and deal one back.

OM_Karlach_COM_9.speaker: Mattis
OM_Karlach_COM_9.text: I've been tossed around a lot too. I want to learn how to fight back, too.

OM_Karlach_COM_26.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_COM_26.text: From the look of things, you've got your wits about you. A clever mind and a bit of style will take you a long way.

OM_Karlach_COM_21.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_COM_21.text: Fight with those, and you may find you never need to use your fists at all.

OM_Karlach_COM_24.speaker: Mattis
OM_Karlach_COM_24.text: In that case, want to buy a lucky ring I found?

OM_Karlach_COM_20.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_COM_20.text: Even I'm not thick enough to fall for the same trick twice. But keep it up, kid, and you'll be scamming with the greats in no time.
OM_Karlach_COM_20.context: NodeContext: Lighthearted, ribbing the kid. This is a goodbye. After this, Karlach and the kid disengage and the player addresses karlach.

OM_Karlach_COM_5.speaker: Player
OM_Karlach_COM_5.text: 'Scamming with the greats'? What kind of advice is that?

OM_Karlach_COM_1.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_COM_1.text: Sorry, soldier, but I didn't ask for your two coppers. The advice I give a tief kid from the Coast is between me and them.
OM_Karlach_COM_1.context: NodeContext: Good-humouredly, but she's not too impressed by the player here.

OM_Karlach_COM_10.speaker: Player
OM_Karlach_COM_10.text: Kid really looks up to you. That's nice to see.

OM_Karlach_COM_2.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_COM_2.text: It is, isn't it. Hope he makes it out of this mess with his wits in one piece. I'd like to see him set up in a proper home in the city. Every kid deserves that.

OM_Karlach_COM_28.speaker: Player
OM_Karlach_COM_28.text: You were too nice to that little runt.

OM_Karlach_COM_25.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_COM_25.text: I used to be that little runt. And anyway, he seems like a good kid. Let's make sure he gets to the city safely.

OM_Karlach_COM_23.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_COM_23.text: Ha! Nice try, shorty. Keep it up, though, and you'll be scamming with the greats in no time.
OM_Karlach_COM_23.context: NodeContext: Lighthearted, ribbing the kid. This is a goodbye. After this, Karlach and the kid disengage and the player addresses karlach.

OM_Karlach_COM_15.speaker: Mattis
OM_Karlach_COM_15.text: Welcome to our humble - wait, are you Karlach?

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_10.speaker: Mattis
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_10.text: Welcome to our humble - wait, are you Karlach?

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_39.speaker: Mattis
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_39.text: A lot of us were in Avernus. We saw you fighting. You were so good!

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_53.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_53.text: Well! I, uh - yeah. I guess I was. I mean, you should avoid fighting for devils if you can. But if you can't, it helps to have a good right hook.
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_53.context: NodeContext: Karlach is feeling a little chuffed at the positive attention here. She's trying to be a good role model but is also delighted that her reputation precedes her

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_45.speaker: Wyll
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_45.text: Ever heard of the Blade of Frontiers, kid? If you like monster-smashing, you might be a fan of his work.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_38.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_38.text: A lovely chap. Didn't kick arse in the Blood War, but that's neither here nor there.
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_38.context: NodeContext: She's winding Wyll up a little/ bringing the focus back onto herself. This is a friendly tug-of-war rather than a very serious one.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_66.speaker: Wyll
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_66.text: That's true - but he never got kidnapped by a devil either.
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_66.context: NodeContext: Still a friendly repartee but Wyll is tryign to get the uperhand and it might be getting a little arch.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_37.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_37.text: No, he only sold his soul to one.
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_37.context: NodeContext: Still a friendly repartee but it's getting pointed now.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_65.speaker: Mattis
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_65.context: NodeContext: Mattis is listening to Wyll and Karlach argue and trying to get waht they're saying. This is the breaking point in the humorous tension up to this point.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_9.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_9.text: Sorry, kid. Look, forget about us begrudgers and bruisers.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_36.speaker: Mattis
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_36.text: How'd you learn to fight like that?

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_42.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_42.text: Had to. Life didn't pull any punches. It was up to me to learn to take a hit - and deal one back.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_31.speaker: Mattis
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_31.text: I want to learn how to fight back, too. I'm sick of getting tossed around.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_8.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_8.text: From the look of things, you've got your wits about you. A clever mind and a bit of style will take you a long way.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_54.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_54.text: Fight with those, and you may find you never need to use your fists at all.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_49.speaker: Mattis
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_49.text: In that case, want to buy a lucky ring?

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_52.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_52.text: Even I'm not thick enough to fall for the same trick twice. But keep it up, kid, and you'll be scamming with the greats in no time.
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_52.context: NodeContext: Lighthearted, ribbing the kid. This is a goodbye. After this, Karlach and the kid disengage and the player addresses karlach.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_60.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_60.text: Ha! Nice try, shorty. Keep it up, though, and you'll be scamming with the greats in no time.
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_60.context: NodeContext: Lighthearted, ribbing the kid. This is a goodbye. After this, Karlach and the kid disengage and the player addresses karlach.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_18.speaker: Mattis
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_18.text: Heya - you're back! I was thinking... I didn't recognise you before, but you're... you're Karlach, aren't you?

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_55.speaker: Mattis
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_55.text: Welcome to our humble - wait, are you Karlach?

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_3.speaker: Mattis
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_3.text: A lot of us were in Avernus. We saw you fighting. You were so good!

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_15.speaker: Mattis
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_15.text: I saw you lay out a maw demon in two hits! Bam, bam! We were all like 'whoa'.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_33.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_33.text: It was the favourite pet of a nasty demon called Bulwig. He wanted to skin me alive after.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_64.speaker: Mattis
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_64.text: But he didn't. He couldn't. You're too strong.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_1.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_1.text: I can't believe you saw that. You're too young for that.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_22.speaker: Mattis
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_22.text: Eh. Apparently not. Anyway, I thought it was pretty great. He didn't stand a chance against you.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_14.speaker: Wyll
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_14.text: Ever heard of the Blade of Frontiers, kid? If you like monster-smashing, you might be a fan of his work.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_26.speaker: Wyll
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_26.context: NodeContext: A sigh first. This is meant to be a funny exchange. Mattis doesn't know him, so this is his response, slightly despondent but funny.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_56.speaker: Mattis
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_56.text: Anyway, um, Karlach how'd you learn to fight?

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_46.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_46.text: Didn't have a choice. Life doesn't pull any punches for a tiefling kid on the Sword Coast.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_29.speaker: Mattis
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_29.text: Oh man. I know. I want to learn how to fight back, too.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_13.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_13.text: You've got wits. Style. Those will take you farther faster than brute strength - believe me.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_6.speaker: Mattis
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_6.text: In that case, want to buy a lucky ring?

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_4.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_4.text: You just do. Go after whatever's in your way - do it with everything you've got.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_0.speaker: Mattis
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_0.text: Hmm. Well I'm not too strong. But I'm pretty fast with my hands...

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_41.speaker: Mattis
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_41.text: Say, want to buy a lucky ring?
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_41.context: NodeContext: Devilish grin, preparing to scam the player

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_35.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_35.text: Even I'm not thick enough to fall for the same trick twice. But keep it up, kid, and you'll be scamming with the greats in no time.
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_35.context: NodeContext: Lighthearted, ribbing the kid. This is a goodbye. After this, Karlach and the kid disengage and the player addresses karlach.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_11.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_11.text: Ha! Nice try, shorty. Keep it up, though, and you'll be scamming with the greats in no time.
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_11.context: NodeContext: Lighthearted, ribbing the kid. This is a goodbye. After this, Karlach and the kid disengage and the player addresses karlach.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_50.speaker: Mattis
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_50.text: Ha! You were really gonna fall for it? You're lucky I like you, Karlach, or I would've taken you for all you're worth.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_7.speaker: Mattis
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_7.text: I'll save it for the city. Lots of nobles strutting around with too much gold, right?

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_20.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_20.text: Keep it, kid. You might need it.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_63.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_63.text: Careful, kid. Once you start, it's hard to stop.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_21.speaker: Mattis
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_21.text: I don't want to hurt anyone. But I don't want them to hurt me. What... what do I do?

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_27.speaker: Mattis
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_27.text: I've been knocked around a lot. But I never had a chance to fight back.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_62.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_62.text: What can I say? I'm a natural born brawler.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_2.speaker: Mattis
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_2.text: I'm not. I don't know how to do anything but run.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_58.speaker: Mattis
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_58.text: How'd you learn to fight like that?

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_25.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_25.text: How long were you in Avernus?

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_57.speaker: Mattis
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_57.text: I dunno. A while. It all kind of blurs together. But we saw you fighting more than once. You were our favourite. No one could take you down - they barely landed a hit!

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_61.speaker: Mattis
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_61.text: Heya - you're back! I was thinking... I didn't recognise you before, but you're... you're Karlach, aren't you?
